title: 13-Month-Old Injured in Accidental Shooting
content:
Error loading player: No playable sources found
LOGAN, Utah (ABC4 Utah) A young child was hospitalized after an accidental shooting at a Logan home Monday evening.
It happened at an apartment complex near 500 North 500 East.
Logan police say a young child got hold of a deer rifle and discharged it hitting the child's 13-month-old sibling in his foot and ankle area.
The child was taken to Primary Children's Hospital in Salt Lake City.
The incident is under investigation.
